ajs_vmax_schechter_fit.pro

topajs_vmax_schechter_fit

result = ajs_vmax_schechter_fit(absmag, vmax, bincentres, meanbin, phi, phierr, phierr2, ninbin, absmagfaint, absmagbright)

This function calculates 1/Vmax LF and finds best-fit Schechter function for input arrays of absolute magnitude and Vmax.

Calls ajs_vmax_lf Calls ajs_schechter_fit

Return value

Result: [mstar,alpha,phistar] See ajs_vmax_lf for more

Parameters

absmag
vmax
bincentres
meanbin
phi
phierr
phierr2
ninbin
absmagfaint
absmagbright
